DOC.brief_summary: The goal research study well understand take part physical activity might help smoker quit .
DOC.brief_title: Move To Quit - Using Physical Activity Facilitate Smoking Cessation Among African American Adults
DOC.detailed_description: If agree take part study , visit Windsor Village United Methodist Church 9 time . You also receive help quit smoking . You may may also enrol exercise program . Visits Windsor Village United Methodist Church : These visit 3 , 2 , 1 week ( ) quit smoking , quit day , 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 8 week quit smoke . Each visit may last 1 hour 1 ½ hour . During visit : - You complete questionnaire feeling , mood , smoke habit , behavior ( physical activity ) . The questionnaire take 45 minute total complete . - You complete breath test . The breath test use find amount tobacco smoke person consumes . For test , blow air tube measure device . - At 3 visit , heart rate also test . For test , put wrist watch belt band sit quietly 5 minute equipment measure heart rate . - At 4 visit , height , weight , waist hip circumference also measure . To measure waist hip circumference , may ask lift shirt expose stomach area low pant expose mid-hip area . Height , weight , waist hip circumference measurement take 10 minute perform private area . Quitting Smoking : You receive help quit smoking , include counsel quit smoke 6-week supply nicotine patch . The counsel phone 1-2 week schedule quit day . Study Groups Physical Activity : In addition visit list , randomly assign ( roll dice ) 1 3 group . You equal chance group . - Group 1 include physical activity . - Group 2 start walk program 2 week quit day finish 2 week quit day . - Group 3 start walk program quit day finish 4 week quit day . All participant ( Groups 1 , 2 , 3 ) wear accelerometer 5 week study . An accelerometer small device wear belt clip elastic belt near hip day . It record active . You receive accelerometer study visit 3 week quit smoke . You wear follow time : - For 14 day row begin 3 week quit smoke . - For 7 day begin quit date . - For 7 day begin visit 2 week follow quit date . - For 7 day begin visit 4 week follow quit date . You bring accelerometer study visit recharge information download . You give prepaid envelope return accelerometer last recording . Physical Activity Groups 2 3 : If Group 2 3 , take part walk program 5 week . You walk 150 minute ( 2 ½ hour ) week . You receive Walking Guide instruction exercise , also contain tip walk program . Final Visit : All participant take part final focus group . This focus group take place sometime study visit 8 week quit smoke . This take 1 hour . You ask think program , include like , like , think could improve . If want provide feedback come focus group , may provide feedback another way ( phone interview could meet study staff church ) . These focus groups/interviews audio record . Your name identify information delete recording transcribed ( type ) outside party . Length Study : You study final focus group visit . Additional Information : Study staff may call home and/or cell phone contact e-mail remind study visit and/or walk activity . If accelerometer lose steal , responsible replacement cost , tell study staff right away . If come study visit list , researcher may call ask smoking status . They may also schedule visit home office take breath sample . Your home address may used access public information area live . This help researcher learn neighborhood encourages physical activity . The result study report group identifiable product result study ( research paper ) . Your home address never release publish form . Your address store separately study data , study chair able see data neighborhood information collect . Other Information : If study staff think response study suggest sign severe depression show express suicidal ideation , qualified member study staff contact review risk suicide . Based review , study staff take step protect safety , range give list resource mental health service contact police feel immediate danger . Plan Data Destruction : After study complete , data analyze , manuscript/s write , access de-identified data file limit study chair research staff , keep file MD Anderson computer server case question data . Your data keep 10 year study complete later 1/01/2025 . After time , data completely delete . This investigational study . The nicotine patch use study FDA approve commercially available . Up 45 participant enrol study . All enrol MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1. selfreported AfricanAmerican race 2. age 2165 3. current daily smoker ( smoked > =100 cigarettes lifetime per selfreport , smoke > =5 cigarette per day last 6 month per selfreport 4. selfreports motivation quit smoking within next 2 week 5. report willingness engage physical activitybased smoking cessation intervention 6. home address function home and/or cell phone number 7. able engage moderate intensity physical activity determine Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) physicians clearance ( letter physician nurse practitioner ) currently take medication blood pressure diabetes . 8. willingness wear nicotine patch provide study recommend 9. expired carbon monoxide ( CO ) level > /8 part per million ( ppm ) suggestive current smoking 10. blood pressure < /=140/90mm physicians clearance ( letter physician nurse practitioner ) blood pressure read > 140/90mm Hg . 1. contraindication nicotine patch use 2. regular use tobacco product cigarettes last 30 day ( include black & milds ) 3. current plan future use nicotine replacement pharmacological product smoking cessation study patch 4. pregnancy lactation 5. another household member enrol study 6. schedule accommodate study procedure , unwillingness adhere procedure
